timeline:
{
"1972":"graduated from the Faculty of Journalism of the Belarusian State University, beginning work in the" Mayak of Communism "- a district newspaper in the town of Bereus, Brest Region",
"1973-1976":"work in the Belarusian“ Selskaya Gazeta ”,
"1976-1984":"the head of the essay and journalism department of the magazine" Neman ""
"1983":"the entry into the Union of Soviet Writers on the recommendation of A. Adamovich, J. Bryl, V. Bykov and V. Vitki",
"2000-2013":"Accommodation in Italy, France, Germany"
}
